main event: A round, white object the size of a half-dollar was sighted near Heppner, Oregon.
interesting points: The object had a slight lateral motion and was moving from northwest to southeast.
The object disappeared in 10 seconds after being observed for 10 minutes.
The object was observed at an elevation of 20 degrees and was moving at a speed of 220 knots.
Two witnesses reported the object, and it appeared to fly into an overcast area, obscuring it from view.
The report states that it is impossible to determine what the object was, but the movement was clearly apparent.
sighted object: round, white object the size of a half-dollar
